<h3 id="X5437">X(5437)&nbsp;=&nbsp;(r + 2R)*X(1) + 6R*X(2) -
2r*X(3)</h3>
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp; a(b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> -
a<sup>2</sup> - 6bc)<br>
<b>X(5437) = (r + 2R)*X(1) + 6R*X(2) - 2r*X(3)&nbsp;&nbsp; (Peter
Moses, April 3, 2013)  </b>

<p>X(5437) lies on these lines:
{1, 474}, {2, 7}, {3, 5436}, {4, 9841}, {5, 84}, {10, 1056}, {37, 9574}, {38, 7322}, {40, 631}, {46, 3624}, {65, 8583}, {85, 738}, {88, 4606}, {100, 4666}, {140, 5709}, {165, 1001}, {171, 5272}, {173, 7028}, {200, 354}, {210, 4860}, {236, 258}, {244, 612}, {281, 1435}, {312, 4659}, {377, 9581}, {381, 7171}, {388, 7091}, {392, 2093}, {404, 3601}, {443, 1210}, {518, 8580}, {549, 3587}, {614, 750}, {936, 942}, {940, 1449}, {946, 6926}, {950, 6904}, {958, 3361}, {960, 3339}, {982, 5268}, {997, 5883}, {999, 9623}, {1054, 8299}, {1155, 4423}, {1329, 5290}, {1375, 5834}, {1420, 5253}, {1490, 6918}, {1519, 6833}, {1656, 3824}, {1697, 3616}, {1698, 3338}, {1699, 3816}, {1709, 3838}, {1768, 6667}, {1995, 7293}, {2098, 3922}, {2478, 9579}, {2551, 4298}, {3149, 8726}, {3182, 7532}, {3189, 6744}, {3208, 5308}, {3220, 5020}, {3247, 3666}, {3304, 3698}, {3359, 5886}, {3475, 6745}, {3487, 6700}, {3576, 3833}, {3589, 7289}, {3600, 5795}, {3740, 5223}, {3754, 7982}, {3763, 5227}, {3772, 4859}, {3784, 5943}, {3825, 6845}, {3873, 9342}, {3920, 9335}, {3925, 5231}, {3980, 4871}, {4035, 4869}, {4187, 9612}, {4208, 5704}, {4292, 5084}, {4415, 4862}, {4454, 8055}, {4640, 8167}, {4652, 5047}, {4850, 5287}, {5044, 5708}, {5045, 6765}, {5119, 5444}, {5123, 5726}, {5128, 5250}, {5284, 9352}, {5285, 7484}, {5535, 6681}, {5587, 6854}, {5705, 8728}, {5715, 6922}, {5737, 6706}, {6223, 9842}, {6245, 6864}, {6260, 6964}, {6668, 6763}, {6701, 7701}, {6705, 6846}, {6916, 7682}, {7521, 7713}
